title: Minor bus timetable changes for Wallan
articleContent:
Minor bus timetable changes for Wallan

From Sunday 23 October 2022, there will be minor timetable changes for the following Wallan bus routes:

  • 1 Wallan Station - Wallan Central
  • 2 Wallan Station â€“ Springridge
  • 3 Wallara Waters Shuttle
  • Wallan Station - Springridge via Wallan Central (Link A)
  • Wallan Station - Wallara Waters Shuttle (Link B)

The new bus timetables provide better connections with the new Shepparton Line timetable.

Check your timetable or plan ahead using Journey planner.
articleDescription: From Oct 2022, there will be minor timetable changes for Wallan bus routes to provide better connections with the new Shepparton Line timetable.
